Member affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid ()
This is bad -- consecutive calles to "rand()" are not random. The values should be hashed with something stronger than ones complement.

printf will pad with "0" if the format string has a leading "0". The format string should be: "%010d-%010d-%010d-%010d-%010d", And is this what a uuid is supposed to look like? 'uuidgen' prints a value like: "a5b4b2ca-006d-4b89-b7ca-14eedb1e02b9"
